rules:
Hey there, please read this channel before joining us in chat!

Though you’re free to do a lot of things in the mansion, there are some norms and set of rules that you should follow in order to keep our mansion pure, free and fun for everybody.

☯ No harassment allowed: Any member found harassing other member in way they absolutely don’t like or want will be punished!
☯ Don’t spam: Keep unwanted spam out of the mansion, please.
